Comments
November 10, 2021
Slade Wilson
The definitive wolverine. Nuff said.
September 15, 2021
DarkTortoise23
With the new mystique(105 points top dial), this guy can be targeted by krakoan revival. May the world weep...
May 4, 2021
Warborg
My new go-to Wolvie. Firstly, he's in the tan outfit, so I'm 90%. The traited Toughness, dmg cap and healing is probably the best representation of his mutant ability to date. One game with him so far & some of it was down to his support, but he shredded. Bigger point teams or getting ganged on, like most, he'll likely go down but with prob and potentially Krakoan Revival, he'll be nasty.
January 13, 2021
GL_Alex
I like this Wolverine. He isn't the top version for 100 points, maybe not even in the top 3, but this one would be fun to play in non tournament matches. I really have to give him a little bit more healing in the way of Vampirism or Angrir's Hammer.
January 9, 2021
Cyke82
If you want to devote a few more points to your Wolverine than the common, this one packs a punch. Moves well through hindering but doesn’t get the Stealth of the Mutant CIA trait. Traited Toughness with a dial full of CR and SS is great. He’s got a cap to damage taken and heals a click to start each turn, which is a nice throwback to some older versions. I think this version stacks up well with some other Wolverines of 100 points.
